page.title: 02TREGONY CONTD..
page.content: hairdresser and dentist who rely on reputable service,mobile customers and benefit from rural rates. Lidge's founded in the 19thC is the only surviving public transport and run 3 services to Truro most week days and ct children for the 480 strong comprehensive school. Mostly since 1970, 122 new houses and bungalows were built.Some infilled long established gaps,the majority were in field known as Lords Meadow,now the name of the development. The population in 1981 was 680 and included over 180 pensioners.While many indigenous families remain an influx of retired upcountry folk is a new trend along with property gentrification and tourism.A little domestic employment continues mainly related to tourism, but most workers now commute to Truro, St.Austell,particularly for E.C.C.
